description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 16/0827/S73 dated 14/03/16 for 'Variation to condition 1 (Plans) pursuant to planning permission H/02121/13 dated 23/09/2013 for 'Removal of Conditions No.9 (Air Quality Assessment) and No.43 (Biomass System). Variation of Conditions No.1(Plan Numbers), No.10 (Extraction and Ventilation); No.15 (Materials) and No.18 (Details - Windows, doors, eaves, brickwork, chimneys, rooflights, metal balustrading, boiler flues, signage and external lighting) and No.22 (rainwater goods & soil vent pipes) of planning permission H/02985/11 dated 01/03/12. Variations to include: demolition and rebuild of The Croft, refurbishment and extension of West Lodge, and amendments to previously approved materials and samples.' Amendments include; Lower existing window cill and provide new window to match host windows at lower ground floor west elevation; Remove existing walkway and steps and turn balustrade around corner to mirror gilt room stair on eastern side; Change consented glazed upper section wall to solid and remove door access; Mono-pitched roof over consented store area below; Replace existing glass with laminated glass in existing frame; Inverted dormer window; Conservation rooflight over communal stairwell; Internal layout has been updated; Boundary line for property encloses the car parking space
